errorSchema.$EQ_PATTERN: The value must be of type string or number or boolean.
errorSchema.$GTE_PATTERN: The value must be of type number or string.

errorSchema.$LTE_PATTERN: The value must be of type number or string.
errorSchema.$LT_PATTERN: The value must be of type number or string.
errorSchema.$MATCH_PATTERN: The value must be of type string.
errorSchema.$NEQ_PATTERN: The value must be of type string or number or boolean.
errorSchema.$NIN_ARRAY_PATTERN: The array must not have any elements of type string.
errorSchema.DATE_PATTERN: The date must be a valid date.
errorSchema.EMAIL_BLACKLIST: The email must be a valid email address and not in the blacklist.
errorSchema.EMAIL_OR_USERNAME_REQUIRED: The email or username is required.
errorSchema.EMAIL_PATTERN: The email must be a valid email address.
errorSchema.LIMIT_PATTERN: Limit must be an integer between 1 and 100
errorSchema.MUST_BE_ARRAY_OR_OBJECT: Must be an array or an object.
errorSchema.OFFSET_PATTERN: Offset must be an integer greater than or equal to 0
errorSchema.PASSWORD_PATTERN: The password must contain at least one uppercase letter, one lowercase letter, one number, and one special character and must have a minimum length of 8 characters and a maximum length of 32 characters.
errorSchema.ROLE_PATTERN: The role must be alphanumeric and between 3 and 16 characters.
errorSchema.USERNAME_PATTERN: The username can only contain letters and numbers and must have a minimum length of 4 characters and a maximum length of 32 characters.
